title: Why is Annie still able to FLASH + R and melt teams?
body: Mages update was a long time ago and Tibbers change was the most reasonable thing? What about actual counter play to her non interactive oppressive combo?

replies.body: The same counterplay as any other champion with aoe hard cc, don't clump together

^ This.

Its also not hard to flash out of if you know what you are doing.
except her Q is a point and click so it'll follow your flash you ape
The Annie rework was specifically intended to preserve this behavior. It is what they want Annie to do.
